data.name: War for the Overworld - Bunny Worker Skin
data.detailed_description:
Sprouting from his warren like a daffodil, Bunny Worker rises with a ravenous appetite - for chocolate eggs!

This cocoa connoisseur will burrow deep in search of chocolate. And you know the thing about chocolate is that it’s brown. And the thing about dirt is that it’s also brown. So keep that nugget dangling on a stick, and this fervent little fellow will burrow out all your dungeons till next winter!

Crack open your Bunny Worker skin and watch him burrow through all non-Campaign game modes.

Happy Easter, Underlord!
data.about_the_game:
Sprouting from his warren like a daffodil, Bunny Worker rises with a ravenous appetite - for chocolate eggs!

This cocoa connoisseur will burrow deep in search of chocolate. And you know the thing about chocolate is that it’s brown. And the thing about dirt is that it’s also brown. So keep that nugget dangling on a stick, and this fervent little fellow will burrow out all your dungeons till next winter!

Crack open your Bunny Worker skin and watch him burrow through all non-Campaign game modes.

Happy Easter, Underlord!
data.short_description: Bunny Worker rose from his warren during Easter 2017. He’s on a ravenous quest for chocolate eggs, and burrows out your dungeon in the process!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 , Windows 8 , Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT400 series with 512MB RAM or better, ATI 4870HD with 512MB RAM or better
  • Hard Drive: 4 GB available space (may increase in the future)
  • Sound: Speakers or headphones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit), Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU @ 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT500 series with 1GB RAM or better, ATI 5870HD with 1GB RAM or better
  • Hard Drive: 8 GB available space (may increase in the future)
  • Sound: Speakers or headphones
